instruction: Identify the theme in this song.
input:
I can feel it in my bones
Here come the tremors
When the ground starts to shake
output: The theme of this song is that of anticipation – the narrator is feeling something coming and is able to sense it in their bones. They know that something is about to happen, and they can sense the tremors, signaling that something is on its way and the ground is starting to shake, increasing the anticipation.
